channel.title: Need help! adding shop
channel.description: i got pimpscape shop an i need to know how to add a barrows shop plase help me thank you :|

item.title: Need help! adding shop
item.dc:creator: @captian_blk captian blk
item.description:
@captian_blk wrote:

still ddint work i did evrything there were no errors but he didnt apear lolz[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 08:49:12 PM[/size][hr]someone please help!!![br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 08:55:04 PM[/size][hr]hello people please help me i did all that but he dosent apear but there is no errors when i run or compile

item.title: Need help! adding shop
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

lol ill do it detaild for u ok lol[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 02:09:14 PM[/size][hr]open up autospawn.cfg and under like [code]spawn = 553 2855 9643 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock Aubury at Magic shop press enter at end of tht to leev space and add spawn = 587 2897 3427 0 2899 3426 2897 3426 1 Jatix now save and exit autospawn… go into shop.cfg now
go to bottom of it and add shop = 42 Bob_Barrows 2 2 4716 1000 4718 1000 4720 1000 4722 1000 4708 1000 4710 1000 4712 1000 4714 1000 4753 1000 4755 1000 4757 1000 4759 1000 4745 1000 4747 1000 4749 1000 4751 1000 4732 1000 4734 1000 4736 1000 4738 1000 4724 1000 4726 1000 4728 1000 4730 1000 change 42 to woteva ur next shop is in da list e.g my last one was 41 so i do 42 now save and exit…

open up client.java search for } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop at end of tht press enter and add } else if (NPCID == 519) { //Bob Barrows PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; //Bob Barrows
change WanneShop = 42 to woteva u put the barrows shop as in shop.cfg…

so shuld be

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 519) { //Bob Barrows PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; //Bob Barrows

tht for me … 519 npc is bob he good for it lol

he wil be at ::fish at varrock fountain next to anvil there u go[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! adding shop
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

ok, add this

[quote=“wazup, post:2, topic:48334”]just loook in tut section lots of how to add shops but da shop is

shop = 42 Bob_Barrows 2 2 4716 1000 4718 1000 4720 1000 4722 1000 4708 1000 4710 1000 4712 1000 4714 1000 4753 1000 4755 1000 4757 1000 4759 1000 4745 1000 4747 1000 4749 1000 4751 1000 4732 1000 4734 1000 4736 1000 4738 1000 4724 1000 4726 1000 4728 1000 4730 1000 just change 42 to like a shop u got at moment to make it easy[/quote]
barrows shop made by wazup in your shop.cfg file
then open up your autospawn.cfg file, make sure the shopkeeper that you
want to be a shopkeeper stands at the top of the file.
Next open up client.java and search (Ctrl + f) for this:
case 17: that’s for your trading command to work
and somewhere bellow you’ll find:

else if (NPCID == ****) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ****; }
now after the NPCID add the ID of the shopkeeper,
after the wanneshop add the ID of the barrows shop
And this should do.

Read full topic
